original_text: His winnowing fork is in his hand, and he will clear his threshing floor, gathering his wheat into the barn and burning up the chaff with unquenchable fire.”
korean_text: 손에 키를 들고 자기의 타작 마당을 정하게 하사 알곡은 모아 곳간에 들이고 쭉정이는 꺼지지 않는 불에 태우시리라

sentences.original_text: His winnowing fork is in his hand
and he will clear his threshing floor
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그의 타작마당을 깨끗이 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: gathering his wheat into the barn
and burning up the chaff with unquenchable fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 쭉정이를 꺼지지 않는 불로 태울 것이다
